alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 8:30PM CDT until April 09 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Saturday was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 4.6 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 17.0 Sat 8 pm CDT 14.0 6.1 5.3 &&
